Configuration

This services works with:

  • Unique file with all translation. @see demo/translations.json
  • Each time the language is changes the translateSrv::ready event is fired providing getCurrentLang() object
  • For images: You can replace your images when you switch the language providing the code part to ng-src attribute in your views. @see getCurrentLang().code
See demo/app.js and demo/index.html for examples.

Usage

Use the translate directive into any HTML tag:

<h1 translate="HEADLINE_TEXT"></h1>
